name: Past 5
description:
Winner of the 2022 Skamling Gamejam!

Have you ever wanted to be stuck in a creepy office after closing hours? Well now you can!

This game was based on the prompt "dark", and made in 48 hours.

WASD and spacebar or arrow keys for movement
Esc to quit

Might receive a few updates if i get notified of bugs or the like :)
